thread.title: Rachel Weisz on Hollywood sexism
thread.title_full: Rachel Weisz on Hollywood sexism - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Rachel Weisz on Hollywood sexism
text:
Actress Rachel Weisz believes that there is a pressure on women to be likeable in Hollywood.
READ: Daniel Craig is a good cook: Rachel Weisz
The 45-year-old actress, who posed for the cover of Harper's Bazaar magazine, believes it is a modern problem.
"I've noticed in my career this tendency towards wanting women to be likeable in a way that's not asked of men.
"I don't understand how that's happened. You know, if you look back at Barbara Stanwyck, Bette Davis they were difficult, difficult women, and they were iconic and worshipped."
 Rachel Weisz Wins Supporting Actress: 2006 Oscars
